title: HelpRequest
description: Schema for a document in the 'HelpRequest' collection, which tracks an instance of providing or identifying a need for help.

interactionLogDocId.description: The document ID of the related entry in the 'InteractionLog' collection.

firstName.description: The first name of the person receiving help. This is shown publicly.

locationLandmark.description: A public landmark or general location of the interaction (no private addresses).

timeOfInteraction.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of when the interaction occurred. Can be null. Represents a Firestore Timestamp.

helpProvidedCategory.description: A list of categories describing the help that was provided.

furtherHelpCategory.description: A list of categories describing any further help that is needed.

followUpDateTime.description: The scheduled date and time for a follow-up. Can be null. Represents a Firestore Timestamp.

additionalDetails.description: Any additional public notes or details about the help request.

interactionLogFirstName.description: Denormalized first name from the interaction log for quick reference and display purposes.
